typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		inss_companyregistrationnumber as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		createdby as string,
		inss_fcaexemption as string,
		inss_englandwalesregistered as string,
		ownerid as string,
		inss_moneyadviserorganisationid as string,
		owninguser as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		inss_name as string,
		inss_tradingbrand as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceStaging
sourceStaging derive(tsCreatedOn = toTimestamp(createdon),
		tsModifiedOn = toTimestamp(modifiedon),
		strINSSMoneyAdviserOrganisationId = toString(inss_moneyadviserorganisationid),
		strINSSName = toString(inss_name)) ~> decolTypeConvertion
decolTypeConvertion derive(blIsValid = iif(isNull(tsCreatedOn) || isNull(tsModifiedOn) || isNull(strINSSMoneyAdviserOrganisationId) || isNull(strINSSName), toBoolean('0'), toBoolean('1'))) ~> dcolIsValid
dcolIsValid derive(tsCreatedOn = coalesce(tsCreatedOn, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		tsModifiedOn = coalesce(tsModifiedOn, toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00')),
		strINSSMoneyAdviserOrganisationId = coalesce(strINSSMoneyAdviserOrganisationId,'missing'),
		strINSSName = coalesce(strINSSName, 'missing')) ~> dcolMandatoryValue
dcolMandatoryValue derive(blIsTruncate = iif(length(strINSSMoneyAdviserOrganisationId) > 36 || length(strINSSName) > 500, toBoolean('1'), toBoolean('0'))) ~> dcolIsTruncate
dcolIsTruncate derive(strINSSMoneyAdviserOrganisationId = left(strINSSMoneyAdviserOrganisationId, 36),
		strINSSName = left(strINSSName, 500)) ~> dcolMandatoryTruncate
dcolMandatoryTruncate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkValidation
